data.title: Obituary for Timothy "Tim" Edward O'Brien
data.meta_description: Timothy "Tim" O'Brien | January 24, 2024 & Miramichi, NB | ... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Timothy "Tim" Edward O'Brien | Adams Funeral Home Ltd.
data.text:
In Loving memory of Timothy “Tim” Edward O’Brien

1971 – 2024

It is with great sadness we announce that Timothy “Tim” Edward O’Brien passed away suddenly at his home on January 24th, 2024, at the age of 52.

Timothy "Tim" Edward O'Brien was born in Cobourg, Ontario, on November 15th, 1971, to Sharon O’Brien (Carroll) and Richard O’Brien. He was Office Manager at Kelly Thermal for the past 8 years. He was a much-loved son, brother, friend and employee. He loved animals.

Besides his parents, Tim is survived by his two brothers: Pat O’Brien (Nathalie) of Napan, and Terry O’Brien of Miramichi; as well as two nieces and one nephew.

At this time, there will be no services. Interment will be in St. Michael’s Cemetery at a later date.

As an ode to Tim’s love of animals, as expressions of sympathy, donations to the Miramichi SPCA would be appreciated by the family.

Arrangements are entrusted to Adams Funeral Home Ltd., 140 King St., Miramichi, NB; telephone (506) 773-3492. Additionally, messages of condolence may be shared online at www.adamsfh.ca

"Where Dedicated People Care"

Est. 1956
